physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a small town in Kajyara
 in Punjab. The photograph shows a clearing at the bottom of a hill. There is a wooden fence snaking through the clearing from the left of the photograph. There are two roofed houses in the photograph. On the right of the photograph
 there is a man on a narrow path. There is a small tear on the bottom-left of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Kajyara, Chumba, Punjab
metadata.materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a small town in Kajyara, in Punjab. The photograph shows a clearing at the bottom of a hill. There is a wooden fence snaking through the clearing from the left of the photograph. There are two roofed houses in the photograph. On the right of the photograph, there is a man on a narrow path. There is a small tear on the bottom-left of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
